main event: An airman with a radar background observed a round object with a red light for 6 seconds near Altus AFB, Oklahoma.
interesting points: The object was noted to be about 10-15 feet in size,It changed direction before disappearing from sight,No satellites were identified in the area at the time,The object was not found on radar or identified as any known aircraft,Insufficient information for conclusion was noted in the report.
sighted object: one round object with red light
